Control Name: 5.12.7 Resource locks are leveraged to protect critical infrastructure of this workload.
Control Statement: Critical infrastructure typically doesn't change often. To prevent accidental/undesired modification of resources, Azure offers the locking functionality where only specific roles and users with permissions are able to delete/modify resources. Locks can be used on critical parts of the infrastructure, but special care needs to be taken in the DevOps process - modification locks can sometimes block automation.
